translation.introduction: A quiz for matching your current mood and relationship status to a suitable Taylor Swift song.

relationship.introduction: For these first four questions, if you are in a relationship, answer them with respect to your current relationship. If you are not currently in a relationship, answer them by considering either your most recent past relationship, or a potential relationship on the horizon, whichever you prefer.

question_1.question: Which of these best describes your relationship?

answers.1: Our relationship ended because of cataclysmic past offenses. OR Our relationship has some serious problems.
answers.2: My feelings were a bit hurt when our relationship ended. OR Our relationship is going ok but has some problems.
answers.3: Our relationship ended, but not in a horribly bad way. It just ended. OR I feel pretty mediocre about the quality of our relationship.
answers.4: I wish I was in a relationship, but I don't think it will happen right now. OR I'm happy without a relationship right now.
answers.5: My relationship is pretty casual at the moment, not official or anything. OR I look back fondly on my past relationship, without feeling hurt or angry.
answers.6: My relationship is going well and we're thinking about long-term commitment.
answers.7: I'm getting married and/or comitting to this relationship for the rest of my life.

question_2.question: What does the future of your relationship look like?

answers.2: We're probably going to see each other again at some point, but we won't be in touch much at all.
answers.3: We might talk a bit less than we did in the past.
answers.4: I'm not sure what our future is.
answers.5: We've got some casual future plans but nothing serious lined up. OR We might hang out but I'm not sure.
answers.6: We're going to be spending a fair amount of time together in the future.
answers.7: We're going to be spending a large amount of time together. Like maybe getting married.

question_3.question: What are the other person's feelings about you?

answers.1: They've told me they hate me.
answers.2: I think they don't like me that much. OR They've insulted me some.
answers.3: They're nice to me but they see me as just a friend.
answers.4: I'm not sure and/or they haven't made it clear to me.
answers.5: They maybe have some non-platonic feelings for me but I'm not sure how strong they are.
answers.6: They've told me that they have some feelings for me.
answers.7: They have openly declared their love for me to the world.

question_4.question: Which of these best describes how you spend your time together?

answers.1: There are significant barriers that prevent us from being together.
answers.2: There aren't any insurmountable barriers between us, but we never do anything together.
answers.3: We do some things together but spend most of our time doing things alone.
answers.4: We do about the same amount of stuff together as we do alone.
answers.5: We do some things alone but spend most of our time doing things together.
answers.6: We do pretty much everything together.
answers.7: We do everything together, and even when we aren't together I only think about us being together.

feeling.introduction: For these next two questions, think about how you feel about your life overall.

question_1.question: Which of these best describes how you feel about yourself?

answers.1: I have a lot of problems and they're all my fault.
answers.2: I have a lot of problems, but I don't think they're all my fault.
answers.3: I don't have a ton of significant problems, but sometimes I think I could do better.
answers.4: I'm not really sure how I feel.
answers.5: I feel pretty good about myself, and am just a little insecure on occasion.
answers.6: I have a few concerns but feel very good overall.
answers.7: I'm awesome, my life is awesome, this is the bomb.

question_2.question: Which of these describes your emotional state?

answers.1: You're really angry about something and/or really depressed about something.
answers.2: You don't like how your life is going and you just want to make a deal to get your old life back.
answers.3: You know something's wrong with your life but you want to ignore it.
answers.4: You've accepted the bad things that have happened to you and are ready to move on from them.
answers.5: You're feeling pretty neutral and you're waiting for life to make you happy.
answers.6: You're actively working to make yourself happy.
answers.7: You're actively working to make yourself happy and trying to make sure that everyone else is happy too.
